name: La Meute
description:
WASD to Move

You play as a Cub ( a baby wolf). 

During a hunt, you've lost sight of your wolf pack.

You need to find them quickly before the night comes.

Use your senses, your wolf pack is howling so you can locate them.

But be careful, the forest is full of danger ...

______________________________________________

This game was made for the "Quarantine Jam" under 48hours by a team of 2 :

- Alexandre Barrault : 3D Artist, Programmer

-Karla Frinchi : 3D Artist, Sound

All assets (Textures, 3D Models, Audio) were made during this deadline except :

Howling sound : https://freesound.org/people/Kingcornz/sounds/378334/
